code: import React,{createContext,useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getAccounts}from'../api/accountApi';export const AccountContext=createContext();const AccountProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[accounts,setAccounts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchAccounts=async()=>{try{const response=await getAccounts();setAccounts(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching accounts',error);}};fetchAccounts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(AccountContext.Provider,{value:{accounts}},children);};export default AccountProvider;
